mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_ProductPM WHERE 1=1
AND productNo LIKE '%${productNo}%'
AND pmNo LIKE '%${pmNo}%'
AND status = #{status}
AND isDelete = 0 order by sequence desc

SELECT
FROM t_ProductPM WHERE 1=1 AND productNo = #{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and isDelete = 0
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_ProductPM (productId, productNo, pmId, pmNo, pmName, type, unit, remark, status, num, unitNum, operator, createTime, lastModifyTime, isDelete, sequence) VALUES
(#{item.productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.pmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.num,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.unitNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_ProductPM SET isDelete = 1 WHERE pmNo = #{pmNo}
